Name: Score Gun
About the game: SCORE GUN! Game Description 'SCORE GUN!' This game made by 11-year-old! did you know? you can kill/damage other players! you can play with another player. Your mission : kill 20 player and get winner! did you know? there is some easter eggs in game! if you think this game is bad, think again! This game made by 11-year-old! if you think translate is bad, you can think developer english skill is very bad! Controls W : Forward A : Left D : Right S : Back Space : Jump Left Mouse Button : Fire Special Gun Right Mouse Button : Aiming R : Reload Requirements ONLY Windows supported. Mac/Linux not supported. You need great computer to run this game. AL Games.
